name: Submersive - Ludumdare48
description:
A game I built in 48 hours minus sleeping, eating and the usual stuff you have to do when you have a family.

Unfortunately I didn't get to finish the game but thought I would upload it any way. Enjoy, let me know if you would like to see this prototype of sorts continued.

Since this is part of the **Compo** entries, the original source code for this can be found here: https://github.com/yonner/Submersive_LD48

Controls

WASD - to move the sub forward/backward/turn left/ turn right

R/F - Descend / Ascend

C/V - Camera view/ Take Picture

X - Full Stop

Q - Quit

To Do

    A scoring mechanism when you take picture of the fish.

    With the points you would then be able to buy up grades to you sub like oxygen scrubbers, extra hull and power.

    Sound / Music.

    Sea creatures that a re better drawn with animations :)

Tools Used

- Unity 2020 (engine)

- Visual Studio 2019 (Coding/Engine)

- Blender3d (3d model maker)
